alert.note: Alert for Allegheny (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 12 at 3:19PM EST until November 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Ohio River At Pittsburgh affecting Allegheny County. .Recent heavy rainfall will result in elevated levels of the Ohio River at Pittsburgh.
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. PAC003-130600- /O.NEW.KPBZ.FL.Y.0009.221112T2019Z-221113T0600Z/ /PTTP1.N.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 319 PM EST Sat Nov 12 2022 ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Ohio River at Pittsburgh. * WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water begins to flow onto the Monongahela Parking Wharf. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet this evening. - Action stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
